channel.title: Envinermental varibiles
channel.description:

if i could get help it would rule!

item.title: Envinermental varibiles
item.dc:creator: @crazyTian crazyTian
item.description:
@crazyTian wrote:

put this in
@echo off
title (the name of your server) Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
